dmca.title: [ABUSE] Abuse! Please Help ME!! It has Happened AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, June 06, 2006 1:52 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Abuse! Please Help ME!! It has Happened
AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!]
Subject: [Fwd: Re: [ABUSE] Abuse! Please Help ME!! It has Happened
AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!]


For your review. Further commentary regarding "copyrights" below.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Abuse! Please Help ME!! It has        Happened
AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Date: Tue, 6 Jun 2006 05:06:03 -0700
From: Crystal <quiverfull@gorge.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>


"Regarding harassment and "inciting violence," removal of a site will
not offer any additional safety for your family. You need to contact
your local law enforcement.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/"


Yes I understand this, which is one reason I am going to FBI on this to
file a complaint today for internet crime.  Due to the fact that this is
not a local issue, there is nothing I can do at this point with my local
law enforcement.  However, having my copyrighted material removed from
the site will go a long way in helping me stop this harassment and the
abuse of this person.

Since I am a writer and my name is out there so is my reputation.  I
feel that what is going on here is a threat to my name as well.  I have
worked hard for what I do have and am asking you if this person has the
right to be allowed to work to destroy what I have done?  At this point
you are the only one who can remove my work from this site.  The owner
of the site has not responded or done anything to remove my work.

Crystal Miller








-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2006 4:52 AM
To: Crystal
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Abuse! Please Help ME!! It has Happened
AGAIN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

copyright@theplanet.com is the clearinghouse for all copyright
infringement reports. You may find their direct contact information at
this URL:

http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Regarding harassment and "inciting violence," removal of a site will not
offer any additional safety for your family. You need to contact your
local law enforcement.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Crystal wrote:
> OK..  I have attached all my previous emails so you can see the
history
> of this very serious situation.  
> 
>  
> 
> It has happened again.   Whoever is posting in my name with my written
> articles has posted again this evening on the web site you host:
qwhip.com
> 
>  
> 
> This is now not only a copyright violation but is harassment to me and
I
> believe could start inciting violence towards my family and myself.
> 
>  
> 
> I have emailed you 3 times (this is the 4^th email) since Friday 
> evening.  My husband called you this evening and I plan on calling you

> tomorrow to see what can be done.
> 
>  
> 
> Here is the article from the website: 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9410
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9410>
>       Here is my article from my website (so you can see that this is
my
> written work): http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/homebirth.html
> 
>  
> 
> My views and the views of the website where this person is posting my 
> articles (posing as me) is diametrically opposed to me.  The only 
> purpose at this point in this it to cause me harm.
> 
>  
> 
> Could you please help me solve this situation? 
> 
>  
> 
> I am doing everything I can do on my end and here is a list of what I
am
> doing:
> 
> 
> 1) I have notified the website (qwhip.com) of my IP numbers so they
can
> compare with who is sending the articles.
> 
>  
> 
> 2) I have contacted The Planet (you folks) to let you know of the
abuse
> and given you the information to show where my articles are coming
from
> and shown you the links to the unauthorized articles on the site.
> 
>  
> 
> 3) I have called the FBI and will begin the process of filing a 
> complaint for internet crime
> 
>  
> 
> 4) I have contacted an attorney and will be seeing what steps I need
to
> take next
> 
>  
> 
> ANY help you can give me to quickly solve this situation would be
> greatly appreciated.   I do not know if this person will stop doing
> this. I do not know who it is, but I will not stand by and allow this
to
> continue to happen to me, my family and my name.  This is causing me 
> time, energy and will start costing all of us money if I have to take 
> this further.
> 
>  
> 
> **Crystal Miller**** (the real one!)****
> 
> http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> 
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Subject:
> Unauthorized Articles of Mine On One Of Your Sites: Please Remove 
> Immediately
> From:
> "Crystal" <quiverfull@gorge.net>
> Date:
> Mon, 5 Jun 2006 05:40:33 -0700
> To:
> <copyright@theplanet.com>
> 
> To:
> <copyright@theplanet.com>
> 
> 
> Yesterday I sent an email to abuse@theplanet.com 
> <abuse@theplanet.com%20%20> (the second one with this same complaint.
I
> sent the first email on Friday evening June 2^nd 2006) informing you
> that one of your websites:  http://qwhip.com/index.php   has articles
of
> mine on that site and they were NOT given to the site by me.  I HAVE 
> NEVER GIVEN ANY AUTHORIZATION FOR MY ARTICLES TO BE USED ON THIS SITE.

> 
>  
> 
> Someone posing as me copied them from my website: 
> http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com <http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/>
> and posted them on this site.
> 
>  
> 
> *****I want the articles removed immediately.  This is a violation of 
> copyright law.********
> 
>  
> 
> Here are the articles and next to each article from the site is a link

> to the article on my website:
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9249
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9249>
> 
> Link to my site with my article:
> http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/timewithjesus.html
> 
>  
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9188
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9188>
> 
> Link to my site with my article: http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/
> 
>  
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9187
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9187>
> 
> Link to my site with my article:
> http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/homemanagement.htm
> 
>  
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9191
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9191>
> 
> Link to my site with my article:
> http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/trainkeepersathome.html
> 
>  
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9209
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9209>
> 
> Link to my site with my article:
> http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/badattitudes.html  (the person doing

> this took the part I had written near the bottom of the page)
> 
>  
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9190
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9190>
> 
> Link to my site with my article:
> http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/meantohomestead.htm  (the person
doing
> this took part of this article, starting about 1/3 the way down the
page).
> 
>  
> 
> I want these articles removed immediately. 
> 
>  
> 
> I will be awaiting your quick response on this.
> 
>  
> 
> If there is any other information you need from me you may contact me
at:
> 
> quiverfull@gorge.net <mailto:quiverfull@gorge.net>
> 
>  
> 
> **Crystal Miller**
> 
> http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com
> 
> <http://lilypie.com/>
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> 
>
------------------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Subject:
> ABUSE OF MY ARTICLES ON ONE OF YOUR SITES!! Please Remove Articles 
> Immediately!
> From:
> "Crystal" <quiverfull@gorge.net>
> Date:
> Sun, 4 Jun 2006 07:26:52 -0700
> To:
> <abuse@theplanet.com>
> 
> To:
> <abuse@theplanet.com>
> 
> 
> This is the second email I have sent to report on abuse of my written 
> materials on the website http://qwhip.com/
> 
>  
> 
> I wrote to you on Friday Evening informing you of the problem and
asking
> for my articles to be removed.
> 
>  
> 
> There are unauthorized articles of mine posted on this site. 
> 
>  
> 
> *I have not given permission for these articles to be used.  Someone 
> posting as me is doing this. *
> 
> * *
> 
> *Having my articles on this site is a violation of copyright law.  I 
> want them removed immediately. *
> 
>  
> 
> I have emailed someone at the site and told them I was not posting 
> them.  I sent my IP and told them to compare with where the messages 
> came from.
> 
>  
> 
> I also asked them to remove my articles as this is a *violation of 
> copyright laws* and they have not removed them.
> 
>  
> 
> The links to the articles are:
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9249
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9249>
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9188
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9188>
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9187
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9187>
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9191
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9191>
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9209
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9209>
> 
> http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9190
> <http://qwhip.com/modules.php?name=Forums&file=viewtopic&t=9190>
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> Thank You, Crystal Miller
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
>  
> 
> 
>
